code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Course=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);const[course,setCourse]=useState('');const addItems=()=>{if(course.trim()!==''){setItems([...items,course]);setCourse('');}};const delItems=i=>{const newItems=[...items];newItems.splice(i,1);setItems(newItems);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Select Course"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{onChange:e=>{setCourse(e.target.value);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:course,children:"select"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"HTML"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"CSS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"JAVASCRIPT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"REACT JS"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{id:"add",onClick:addItems,children:"ADD"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tbl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{border:"1px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[item," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>delItems(index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("u",{children:"Delete"})})})]},index))})})})]});};export default Course;
